main event: An unidentified object was observed for 15 minutes in Marietta, Ohio, on July 22, 1964.
interesting points: The object appeared luminous white and quite brilliant., It ascended rapidly and silently., The witness reported the object had a round shape and was quite small., The object moved both in front of and behind clouds during the observation., The witness has reported seeing similar objects on two other occasions.
witness description: A 46-year-old male resident of Marietta, Ohio.
